resources.string: Date of last checked but error was occurred:
Schedule for: Informatics I degree on WFMiI
Schedule for: Informatics II degree on WFMiI
Play notification sound when schedule was changed

string-array.name: error_type_array
string-array.item: No internet connection. Please check your internet connection and try \"Check now\" again.
Unable to download file, maybe CUT web page is temporary down. Please try \"Check now\" again later.
Unable to parse downloaded file. Please contact with author (nkg753@gmail.com) and wait for upgrade of this app.

resources.string: Unable to check if CUT schedule was changed
Schedule for informatics I and II degree of part-time studies was changed.
Schedule for informatics I degree of part-time studies was changed.
Schedule for informatics II degree of part-time studies was changed.
Please waitâ€¦ if the schedule will be hanged I notify you.
